SMC_functions: What are the main functions of SMC?
register_login: How do I register and login to SMC?
register_login_description: Register and login with your mobile number for verification, and for a quick start, you can also choose to login as a guest.
search_SMC: How can I search for available SMC in SMC?
manage_reservations_description: Absolutely! You can easily manage your reservations, check availability, and view pricing options right from the app.
payment_methods_description: SMC supports various electronic payment methods, ensuring a secure and hassle-free transaction experience.
payment_security: How secure is the payment process?
payment_security_description: Rest assured, our app employs top-notch digital security technologies and encryption to safeguard your payment details.
user_support: Is there a support system for users?
user_support_description: Yes, our dedicated support team is ready to assist you with any inquiries or issues through multiple channels, ensuring a seamless experience.
data_protection: How does SMC protect my reservation data?
data_protection_description: We prioritize your privacy. SMC employs the latest encryption and security technologies to safeguard your personal and reservation information.
access_delete_data: Can I access or delete my data on SMC?
access_delete_data_description: Certainly! SMC provides you with options to access, correct, or delete your reservation data, putting you in control of your information.
SMC_intro_description: SMC is an app designed exclusively for connecting with medical therapists, making it easy for you to find and book therapy sessions from your mobile device.
SMC_functions_description: SMC focuses on streamlining your therapy booking process. Key features include discovering available therapists, booking sessions, and ensuring the security of your personal data.
search_SMC_description: SMC comes with an advanced search system allowing you to filter therapists based on location, availability, specialty, and other preferences.
